query: <s> what did grad d and grad c discuss about who was acting as the computer and wizard ?
answer: grad c : wait , can i i have a question . so . so there 's no system , right ? like , there was a wizard for both uh both parts , is this right ? grad d : yeah . it was bo it both times the same person . one time , pretending to be a system , one time , to pretending to be a human , which is actually not pretending . grad c : ok . and she did n't grad d : i should grad c : i mean . well . is n't this kind of obvious when it says `` ok now you 're talking to a human `` and then the human has the same voice ?
